quoteLast: a second warning was received by the _Titanic_, this time from the _Californian_, which reported ice about 19 miles to the northward of the track on which the _Titanic_ was steaming. quoteFirst: After breakfast, most men went to the billiard-room; some, but very few, preferred "peacocking," which meant robing in white-grass clothes and riding under a roasting sun, as near the meridian as possible, to call upon "regimental ladies," who were gruff as corporals when the function was neglected too long. The dull and tedious afternoon again belonged to _munshi_, and ended with a constitutional ride, or a rare glance at the band; Mess
quoteLast: , possibly a game of whist, and a stroll home under the marvellous Gujarat skies, through a scene of perfect loveliness, a paradise bounded by the whity-black line.
